queue.title: Message Queue
queue.pausedHint: Queue paused - click "Send" or add new message to resume
queue.pausedByInterruption: Queue paused by interruption. Use "Send Now" or add a new message to resume.
queue.stopAndSend: Stop current processing and send this message now

userMessage.editInPlaceTitle: Update the message in this session
userMessage.forkSessionTitle: Create a new session with the edited message

elicitation.defaultMessage: AGIME needs some information from you.

interruption.stopDesc: This will immediately stop the current processing and clear any queued messages.
interruption.pauseDesc: This will pause the current processing. Queued messages will be preserved.
interruption.redirectDesc: This will stop current processing and redirect to a new task.
interruption.interruptDesc: This will interrupt the current processing.
interruption.backdropHint: Click outside or press Cancel to continue current processing

gooseMessage.agentWaitingResponse: The agent may be waiting for a response. Please try restarting the session.

costTracker.pricingUnavailable: Pricing data unavailable - OpenRouter connection failed. Click refresh in settings to retry.

popularTopics.title: Popular chat topics
popularTopics.organizePhotos: Organize the photos on my desktop into neat little folders by subject matter
popularTopics.governmentForms: Describe in detail how various forms of government works and rank each by units of geese
popularTopics.tamagotchiGame: Develop a tamagotchi game that lives on my computer and follows a pixelated styling

toolConfirmation.requestQuestion: AGIME would like to call the above tool. Allow?

progressiveLoading.searchHint: Press Cmd/Ctrl+F to load all messages immediately for search

approveMode.description: Approve requests can either be given to all tool requests or determine which actions may need integration
approveMode.manualDescription: All tools, extensions and file modifications will require human approval
approveMode.smartDescription: Intelligently determine which actions need approval based on risk level
